name: Snug Cove Bed and Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2014, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2 night stay as part of our coastal journey from Melbourne to Sydney.
reviews.title: Everything you have read and more

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Jen & Eric are wonderful hosts who go a step beyond for every guest.
reviews.title: Wonderful view, very friendly and professional hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The views from the rooms are to die for. The rooms themselves (4 in number) are spacious and 3 of them have fantastic upper balcony views. Large bathrooms with bath and shower and a "guest" lounge to use as you'd wish. 2 fridges available for guest use.
reviews.title: Top Value and Top Hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Early evening drinks and nibbles provided and Jen sorts out whatever you need for dining with suitable recommendations. Eric is the jovial (dry humoured host) who thinks he is in command but you get the feeling Jen is the powerhouse (sorry Eric and not influenced by cricket.... Honest!)
reviews.title: Awesome views at the perfect B&B
Little paradise
reviews.text: You will not find a better alternative for accommodation in the area.

description: Uninterrupted views of Twofold Bay from your room. Even from your bath. Walk to shops, wharf, beach, museum and cafes. We want you to enjoy your stay in Eden and endeavor to make you as comfortable as possible sharing local knowledge, welcoming drinks on arrival and of course the views. Our rooms are an eclectic mix of old and new. We offer homemade cake and biscuits for you to enjoy while having a cuppa on your balcony.During the months of September, October and November Eden is a great base for whale watching either from land or from the Cat Balou Cruise boat.Sometimes we look down and see dolphins and seals in the bay.Kangaroos graze on the greens at the Eden Golf course and the variety of birds we see from our deck is fantastic.
